name: An-unnecroman-seeable-future
description:
INFORMATION:
This game was made with little manpower and is **H A R D**.
It is about traversing the necromancers dungeon and finding your way out. But beware! The traps are invisible until you set them off! Die from a trap and you will get currency you can spend to buy your way to freedom!
Ps. the dungeon is filled with orcs.

# CONTROLS
> Left mouse navigates the player around
> When in combat, use A and D to dodge left and right, use left or right mouse button to attack.
> Use SPACE to reveal an area on the map, holding down spawn will show the area, releasing space will reveal in that area.
!!You can only reveal areas when you have bought the reveal scroll!!
